Title: Relates to compensation for information concerning fraudulent insurance transaction
Summary: Provides that any person who provides information to the attorney general, a district attorney or the insurance frauds bureau concerning a fraudulent insurance transaction or with information about a fraudulent insurance transaction that is about to take place may be entitled to an award of forty percent of the action or claim relating to such fraudulent action.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to compensation for reports of insurance fraud to law enforcement authorities
